sentences: Greg Roberts (born 29 May 1958) is a British rock drummer.
He was part of Big Audio Dynamite from 1984 to 1989.

He went on to form Screaming Target in 1991 with ex-Big Audio Dynamite members Don Letts and Leo 'E-Zee Kill' Williams, then started Dreadzone with Tim Bran, Williams and Dan Donovan, another former Big Audio Dynamite member.
